name: UseObject
description: Use or operate an object in the simulation world.
usage: Use this action when you want to interact with an object to perform a specific function.

parameters.name: object_name
parameters.description: The name of the object to use

examples: Using a phone to make a call
Using a computer to check emails
Using a kitchen appliance to cook
Using furniture to sit or rest
requirements: Object must be nearby and interactable
Object must be included in the available interactable entities
whenToUse: Need to perform a task with an object
Want to operate a device or appliance
Need to use furniture for its intended purpose
Want to interact with interactive objects
